segments.text: Tom , you're my good friend , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What's the matter with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The exam ! The terrible exam ! I'm not ready yet . Can you tell me how to get good marks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't be so nervous ! Relax ! First , sleep early at night . Second , study two hours a day after school . Third , don't tire yourself out , but don't be lazy . Will that help ?
segments.speaker: S2
